medications.name: Lisinopril
medications.notes: Take in the morning before breakfast

medications.name: Atorvastatin
medications.notes: Take in the evening after dinner

medications.name: Levothyroxine
medications.notes: Take 30 minutes before breakfast, do not take with calcium or iron

medications.name: Vitamin D3
medications.notes: Take with food for better absorption

medications.name: Alendronate
medications.notes: Take on empty stomach with full glass of water. Stay upright for 30 minutes after taking.

medications.name: Paracetamol
medications.notes: Take as needed for pain, maximum 8 tablets in 24 hours

medications.name: Calcium Carbonate
medications.notes: Take with food. Do not take with levothyroxine

medications.name: Metformin
medications.notes: Take with meals to reduce stomach upset

medications.name: Aspirin
medications.notes: Take with food to protect stomach

medications.name: Tamsulosin
medications.notes: Take after evening meal at same time each day

medications.name: Sertraline
medications.notes: May take several weeks to feel full effect

medications.name: Pregabalin
medications.notes: Do not stop suddenly, must taper if discontinuing

medications.name: Salbutamol
medications.notes: Use inhaler when needed for breathlessness

medications.name: Escitalopram
medications.notes: Take at same time each day with food

medications.name: Cetirizine
medications.notes: Take in evening to prevent daytime drowsiness

medications.name: Amlodipine
medications.notes: Can take with or without food

medications.name: Ibuprofen
medications.notes: Take with food, maximum 3 times daily

medications.name: Levodopa
medications.notes: Take 30-60 minutes before meals for best absorption

medications.name: Bisoprolol
medications.notes: Do not stop suddenly without consulting doctor

medications.name: Apixaban
medications.notes: Very important to take exactly as prescribed - do not miss doses

medications.name: Simvastatin
medications.notes: Take in evening - cholesterol is produced at night

medications.name: Latanoprost
medications.notes: Eye drops - use in evening. Remove contact lenses before application

medications.name: Ropinirole
medications.notes: Take with food to reduce nausea

medications.name: Methotrexate
medications.notes: IMPORTANT: Take ONLY on Sundays. Take folic acid on other days

medications.name: Folic Acid
medications.notes: Do NOT take on Sunday (Methotrexate day)

medications.notes: Take as needed for pain, maximum 3 times daily with food

medications.name: Symbicort

medications.notes: Take after food with plenty of water

medications.name: Sumatriptan
